title: The Rainbow in Our Memory
overview: A warm and inspiring school drama about a couple of childhood friends Chen Mu Guang and Shi Fan Tuan, who supported each other throughout their youth and eventually got married after twenty years of vicissitudes.Guan lived a difficult life, but remained an honest and decent young man. Outwardly, he may seem cold, but in fact he is sensitive and affectionate. Shi Fan Tuan is a silly girl from books about unicorns. Growing up together of two opposite personalities is bound to lead to a lot of incidents.Adapted from the novel "Lian Lian Bu Wang" (冰蓝纱) Bin Lan Sha (冰蓝纱) .
